Articles.Content: Heyo! First time starting a new thread here, and just wanted to suggest that some of you follow a cool game called NavalAction. I don't intend to advertise however this caught my eye on the Steam Greenlight and had to share it with a wider audience. I'm posting this here because I think many of you will be interested in a realistic sim like this. Anyway, here's a link to the official website: http://www.navalaction.com/
